kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

test.status:
Several failures occurred:
1) Element 'xpath=(//label[text()='Total belanja'])[1]/following-sibling::label' should have contained text '821,769' but its text was 'Rp 0'.
2) Element 'xpath=(//label[text()='Ukuran']/following-sibling::label[1])[1]' should have contained text '15' but its text was ': 20 x 10 x 5'.
